base.name: ImageSource
base.description: Loads an image (png, jpeg) as a set of matrices.
base.development_notes: We could decide to return a MxNx3 tensor, but this does not seem to be supported yet by cmlc.

parameter_definitions.name: file_name
parameter_definitions.description: Name of the image file to load.

parameter_definitions.name: normalize
parameter_definitions.description: Controls the range of pixel values. If true: [0,1], else: [0,255].
